task.title: Relocate custom.css/design spec and ensure stylesheet is served reliably
task.author: user

steps.summary: Request: place custom.css and design-spec.md in a proper location and update code as needed.
Checked where /custom.css is referenced and how it was being served (apps/todo-list/main.go, shared/templates/base.go, templates/app-template/main.go.tmpl).
Moved custom.css into the shared/templates module and embedded it with go:embed so it can be served independent of the current working directory; moved design spec under docs/.

Relocated files and implemented embedded CSS handler; updated todo-list and app-template to serve /custom.css via sharedTemplates.CustomCSSHandler (shared/templates/custom.css, shared/templates/custom_css.go, apps/todo-list/main.go, templates/app-template/main.go.tmpl, docs/design-spec.md).
Ran go test ./apps/todo-list/... and go test ./shared/templates/... (pass).

final_summary: Moved the shared stylesheet into shared/templates and embedded it so /custom.css is always served correctly, and relocated the design spec to docs/ with no runtime dependencies.
